title: Natural Explorer
content:
and Wanderer: Fire: You have spent endless days surviving forbidden deserts. You gain Resistance toFire. Wasteland Wanderer: Poison: You have spent endless days surviving fetid swamps. You gain Resistance toPoison.

You have cultivated a strong bond with animals. You can castFind Familiar as a Ritual.

An expert at navigating the wild within the city, you gain Proficiency in Sleight of Hand.

You have spent endless days surviving desolate tundras. You gain Resistance toCold.
